Multivariate and Categorical Statistics Chapter 1 Prerequisites

Multivariate and Categorical Statistics Daniela Pinto Veizaga & Sebatián Cadavid Sánchez 2020-03-26 Chapter 1 Prerequisites The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: Hello install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.
